website_summaries.verdict: A versatile and inexpensive body massager with stellar battery life.
pros: Battery lasts up to six hours when completely charged
Lightweight and easy to take on the go
Offers 20 speeds and six interchangeable heads to target different muscle groups
cons: Some reported that it stopped working after a few minutes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: *******update******* received my replacement and it works perfectly! It was also quick shipping. Would recommend others to order. Great customer service with follow up! old review: Quick shipping! Worked great for ten minutes, on and off. And then all of a sudden the intensity went to 20 on its own. When I tried to decrease the intensity, it would not allow me to. I had to turn off and back on. Then tried to increase intensity, and again it went to 20 on its own after I put it at 2 or 3. I want to keep it but will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: LuckyLu

customer_reviews.title: This is a serious tool
customer_reviews.text: This comes with a high price tag but it’s worth every penny. It’s not a simple vibrating massager but a heavy duty percussion massager. It has three impact settings and multiple attachments that is sure to provide the perfect combination for all your post workout pains and strains as well as muscular and joint pains from day to day life. Its rechargeable powerful battery (which also is the devices handle) gives it complete portability for use on the go like at the gym or out for a hike or rock climb.
customer_reviews.author: Tuan Vo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I had one from another brand already but my husband said we need to get another one to back it up. This one is a bit smaller than the one I had before but to my surprise, it is so quiet and powerful. We love it! It is easy to hold on to it and it relieved pain and sore. Especially I have a smaller hand, so I really like this one. I can't tell the battery life yet but it sure can finish relaxing your muscle and back! I personally also like the price! It is affordable, easy to handle, and quiet! Trust me, take this one!
customer_reviews.author: Fonjean

customer_reviews.title: Massage 💆 please
customer_reviews.text: Just a day of using this and I'm already in love with it. It's easy to use and and the 30 different speed settings will just suit to pretty much everyone's liking. It has 6 different heads, my personal favorite being the air cushion head. I have a bad knee and stiff muscles on the calf and hamstring most of the time. Using this does help with it and its similar to the one my therapist use to use on me when I was doing my therapy. I would definitely recommend this product. As an added bonus it has good battery life and it comes with a pretty convenient case.
customer_reviews.author: $JM💋

customer_reviews.title: Horrendous customer service and no response
customer_reviews.text: The product stopped working and the customer service was absolutely horrible they kept telling me to wait and wait and never responded This product is really good because you can use it right out of the box charged to 80%. It comes with a really nice carrying case great for travel. It comes with several attachments for great price I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Ian Aiuto

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: The massage gun is a gift for my mother. She sometimes feels sore legs because of work reasons, and the massage gun can help her pain relief. Its vibration frequency can be adjusted manually without causing discomfort due to a too fast rate. My mother likes this product very much.
customer_reviews.author: JX

customer_reviews.title: Love the feeling BUT turns off!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this gun and wanted to keep it BUT the level keeps going down to the point lf turning itself off. It happens all random. But i see that the only bad reviews is the same thing. It sucks cause you are enjoying it but really cant cause it keeps shutting off. I dont think i would be purchasing the same gun again even though we did love it while it was on. :(
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Great relief and good battery
customer_reviews.text: Ok literally STOP what your doing and get this. If you suffer from muscle aches, soreness, pain, get this one. 1. It's one of the cheaper models on the market and it's definitely worth every penny. 2. It isn't too loud, something that is important for the high intensity that these machines operate at. 3. It has 20 speeds which is nice for muscle pain. 4. Battery is really good, and it's easy to travel with. I literally use this every day because I have a lot of pain in my back and calfs.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Koh

customer_reviews.title: Better ones out there
customer_reviews.text: Charged it up and about 5min into the first use the speed kept dropping to zero and stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great for problem areas
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered very quickly. Nice packaging, case and case for heads. The tool did seem heavy at first but did not seem too heavy while using it. Instructions were well written, product was easy to use. It does have the automatic shut off after 10 mins. However, I think 10 mins is plenty of time for use. It is easy to focus on problem areas with the different tools provided. It was great for my husband's bad ankle, for my bursitis and stiff neck. I would definitely recommend. I have a flat massager that my chiropractic office uses that cost over double this. I actually prefer this item over the flat one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Good Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to the super expensive name brand. There are multiple head attachments for different areas - follow the instruction manual for each use. The harder you press down, the more control you have over the machine but you also don't feel the different speeds available. If you press too lightly then you risk losing control of the machine and it can vibrate uncomfortably over other areas/bones. There is quite some shaking you'll experience from the machine overall while you are holding - I highly recommend using two hands.
customer_reviews.author: A.Natalee

customer_reviews.title: Great massage gun for soreness
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing massage gun for all those sore, hard-to-reach joints that I've had problems with. I didn't want to continue paying full price for a massage when I can just do it myself. This gun comes with a lot of different attachments, varying speeds/vibrations, and can hit all the pressure points and joints I need. I didn't even realize some spots would feel as good as they do until it reached those points. This was a great investment, especially with all the stresses COVID is bringing, and I'm happy with this immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on | UPDATE new gun works well
customer_reviews.text: Update: seller responded to my review and sent a new gun that works! We really like it. . . . The massager shuts down with little to any pressure. Cheap, doesn't work. Returning asap
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: A good mother's day gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my mother as her mother's day gift. When she received this, she was really happy. She said it was the best gift because it is what she needs now. 6 massage heads aim at different muscle groups. She loves the big ball head. She usually uses it for her two sides of neck. Before having it, I massaged her neck When she needed. However, she can have a self massage by using this massage gun now. I think it is a gift for me too. In addition, It is easy to carry. Different speed setting can satisfy different needs.
customer_reviews.author: MIN

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for your Buck !!
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to this kind of massage gun through my friend and wanted to give it a try. There’re so many choices on Amazon the price ranges from $50 to over $200. I decided to give this one a try and I also bought one around $120 for comparison. Both, this model and the $120 one offered similar functions and massage heads. I found this model has better build quality, fits in my hand better and offer over speed. I decided return the $120 one and keep this model for the best bang for my bucks. My parents tried and fell in love with this massage gun as well. Definitely recommended this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Lin

customer_reviews.title: As Good as the Chiropractors Massage Gun
customer_reviews.text: This machine has some serious power! Apply pressure as you’re using it for even more power. Multiple heads are great for different areas of the body and the carrying case is great for storing all parts. I’ve used it multiple times on just one charge, the battery is long lasting. I would say this is definitely comparable to the machine used in my chiropractors office. The best part is being able to take care of my pain without leaving my house!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The massager will shut off within seconds of it being on. The slot where the various massage heads came with this black slime inside it. The intensity will move up and down all on its own and the power/battery will not hold. Not worth the money for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie lopez

customer_reviews.title: Great for working out the pain.
customer_reviews.text: I have had pain in my knee for almost 3 months and just have been dealing with it. I went ahead and bought this and have been using is every night since I have received it. After the first use on my knee I noticed my knee wasn’t painful to the touch. So I have been using it every night and it has been helping. Several different attachments and easy to use. I highly recommend this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It was recommended to me by a massage therapist to get one of these (tells ya how tight you are when they tell you to get something else to help! Lol). I love that you can change the strength. I also like the different heads that it comes with. It comes in a nice storage case that also nicely contains the heads. I would definitely recommend this to others!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Play sports? General muscle aches
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in the family love this. My kids use it after games or practice. My husband uses it after yard work. I use it cause I hurt. The different attachments help individualize the needs of each of us. The battery life is soo much longer than I thought it would be. Plus the husband doesn’t complain about me wanting a back massage cause his hands no longer hurt from it.
customer_reviews.author: Downard2012

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fulfills its purpose!
customer_reviews.text: This is very sturdy, easy to use. It arrived fully charged and in a convenient carrying case. I’ve been doing a lot of writing so I purchased in mind to use on my hands for relief and am very pleased. I also stand a lot and used on my calves and Psoas. Comes with different attachment pieces. I believe the price is a good deal and this is a good starter product rather than getting a more expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: Turtey

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I'm a CNA so I do a lot of people lifting at my job my lower back is always sore and my sciatic nerve. I also have a pinched nerve jn my upper shoulder area. This thing feels so good on those areas!! Also my thighs!! I like to use it on 7-15 with the occasional 20. My fiance also loves it for his feet and back. I wish I could use it on my back by myself more conveniently but for the most part my fiance uses it on me as I do to him.
customer_reviews.author: ShanaesBooty

customer_reviews.title: Nice accompanying tools.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the massage tools that come with this item. The sponge tools that came with this item is non-absorbent, so you can add oils and creams without it getting into the pores of the sponge. Great digital touch increase and decrease of speed. I received this item for a discount for my review of the item.
customer_reviews.author: BLUEBUNNY

customer_reviews.title: Loses power Immediately
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product and worked fine using it once a day for about a month. Now it drops the power to zero without any use. Really disappointed. What a waste Of money. I’ve been contacted by the company and they have sent me a new massager. Only used it once and it holds the power.. the other one lasted about five or six weeks. We will see how this one does. Was Impressed with the rapid reply and service. Maybe I just had a lemon
customer_reviews.author: LORENA  A DESAUTELS

customer_reviews.title: Very happy, works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, and now my whole family loves it! Works great, and the attachments and carrying case are awesome too. The battery life seems great so far, it charges pretty fast as well. For the price and what you get, id buy it again and again and would recommend it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Tokanel

customer_reviews.title: To much vibration
customer_reviews.text: Just vibrates more than it is supposed to. The body moves just as much as the head. A High quality one will not vibrate around like this one does.
customer_reviews.author: jurwin

customer_reviews.title: What a great value!
customer_reviews.text: I have some mid-back, low-back and shoulder pain. These areas are difficult to self-massage. This handheld massager has been the PERFECT addition to my self-care routine. I feel relief almost immediately, and not just for a few minutes. In many cases, I'm able to loosen up the tight spots for several hours. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Rattle massage gun
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product for muscle pain relief and easy to use. Although, this thing rattles internally really bad and it LOUD. You can hear the battery shaking inside. It sounds like there is no insulation. Also, the nozzle where you attach the different heads, rattles really bad also. Its not a quality build product, it need to be quieter with better internal insulation or padding.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: To get the gun to work at the set speed you have to apply heavy pressure to the area being massaged. Prior to that the gun runs at a much slower speed. Unless the heavy pressure is held throughout the massage the speed continues to change as soon as the pressure is released. If this was how the gun was designed it's a very poor design. If not, this particular unit is trash.
customer_reviews.author: Dad Li

customer_reviews.title: Multiple massage functions
customer_reviews.text: This massage can help you wherever you can’t press, you can adjust the speed, there are 5 can be changed according to different positions, you don’t have to be afraid to find the position when you are sore, it can help you press deep Relieve pain everywhere, it is great for the elderly, it can be used very easily
customer_reviews.author: jinpingzou

customer_reviews.title: Massage Bliss
customer_reviews.text: I got this massager yesterday and I used it for my lower back and OMG, when I tell you it’s powerful!! This massager had me in paradise. It’s easy to use and it came already charged!! This was a great buy. The product is well worth the money. If you need a relaxing massage experience at home I’d recommend you buy this massager!
customer_reviews.author: A. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work at all!!!! Fully charged won’t even turn on to work ! Highly disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Quan

customer_reviews.title: poor workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The massager didn't work out of the box. I did not get a chance to try it and didn't feel like buying another one from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Arriaza

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight  6 attachments included
customer_reviews.text: This massage gum can effectively relieve the muscle soreness after my exercise, and it is very comfortable after the massage. This has multiple massage heads that can be replaced and used in different places. Multiple files can be adjusted, very practical .And it's a good deal
customer_reviews.author: Jing Chen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect massage gun at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely one of the best stuffs I got from Amazon recently. I’m pregnant now and used this gun to message my legs. It’s just so relaxing and comfortable. I can see it would also work after a heavy workout! Definitely recommend! Also the price is quite reasonable!
customer_reviews.author: linnn

customer_reviews.title: Best $60 I've ever spent!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just heard about these massage guns last week or so and had to get one because my back was acting up. This one looked to be the best for the price and I definitely made the right decision. Man this thing had me close to 100% after 3-4 days of using it consistently. Do not think twice about getting this bad boy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony N.

customer_reviews.title: Helped relieve muscle pain and battery lasts long
customer_reviews.text: Both me and my husband love this massage fun, it works just like the $300-$400 ones but saved us a lot money. Me and my husband workout 4 days a week so we always have muscle soreness and tightness, this massage gun helped us relax our muscle after workout. When we went to a road trip I even used it for my husband while his drive to relieve his neck pain. Wherever we go we carry it, that’s how much we love it! And the battery lasts pretty long, we use it several times daily and the battery lasts more than a week.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good massage gun works perfecr during my pre-work out to warm up the muscles and post work to decrease the tighness of the muscles. It feels really great after used the massage gun as well as the machine is Easy to use, not complicate at all! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Chou

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun has really been worth the money, I’ve been using it to keep my calves/hamstrings loose which has really helped my issues with knee and foot pain. I’d strongly recommend this to anyone looking for knee pain or plantar fasciitis options.
customer_reviews.author: David FazzariTop Contributor: Archery

customer_reviews.title: Powerful & Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely worth the price. I have chronic back pain and my husband is a runner. I get relief for my back and he uses it for after workout muscle recovery. It has so many different attachments and the POWER settings are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ashes San

customer_reviews.title: A very nice gift for my mother.
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun was given to my mother. She has problems with shoulder pain and waist and leg pain. A friend introduced me to buy this massage gun. My mom very happy. This massage gun has 6 different massage heads, different massage speeds, and a box to store them inside, easy to carry!
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! Good muscle massage experience.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying a sport massage gun though I saw a lot people on social media using it. I do have a back massager with heater, that one is not bad but I have to say this massage gun is more flexible to use. I used it yesterday after basketball for my back, It is really powerful and my muscle get relaxed in a very enjoyable and smooth process if you control the strength properly (like from 1-4). I will recommend to my friends if they want try a massage gun with limited budget! The battery life looks good so far! I used one hour and it took about 5%. Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Michael. H.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of 2020
customer_reviews.text: Best spent $80 of my 2020 purchases. This is my first massage gun so I don’t know how it is comparing to other products, but I certainly had an wonderful experience with it. It different to messages by hand and yet it is just so relaxing. For me the best part is how it works on the shoulders, when you sit in front of a desk all day there’s nothing better.
customer_reviews.author: J Hu

customer_reviews.title: Randomly dies...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this product as I have really terrible shoulder and neck pain. For the first couple of weeks the product worked fine. Then suddenly the massage gun would die randomly. And now it won't hold a charge for longer than 5 minutes. And it happened to die just 4 days outside the return window. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: Press down real hard to get it going
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun looks good and seems to work well, however does not admit adequate force. There are many speed settings but minor difference from 1 to 20. When heavy sustained pressure is applied to the muscle through the massage gun, the force improves tremendously. At first I thought it might not be fully charged, then thought maybe I did not have the attachment head pushed in all the way but no. It would be a great purchase if you did not have to apply so much pressure for it to kick into gear. Might be nice for trigger points but not to maintain that pressure as you slide and move across the body.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and aids in muscle pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Overall it’s very easy to use and aids in muscle pain/tightness. At first I felt the base was a bit heavy to hold and worried if I could use it but once I turned it on to try, it wasn’t as heavy as I first thought. I like the storage of the gun & all of its parts; very neat and organized. However, the issue I have is when I opened the case where the attachments are kept, I found that the large hard foam ball is damaged and had a huge split in it. I’d like to know how can I just receive a replacement large ball attachment only?
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Williams

customer_reviews.title: Helped with my calf pain
customer_reviews.text: The product is very useful. I was having pain in my calf muscles and thought of going for this and trust me it changed my life. I used it for 3 days, 5 min each and the pain was gone totally. It help relaxing ur muscles and loosen them up.
customer_reviews.author: Tushar

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and comfor
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun is good, it come in bag and have 6 difference kind massage head for use different place on the body. This gun is not very heavy, and have the power and battery level digital. I can also check the battery and what power levels I using for relax my body. It is value for the money
customer_reviews.author: boody

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Massage Gun!
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first time purchasing a massage gun and I am really surprised by this good product! The item is well-packaged and the case is very convenient to keep up everything. There are 6 types of massage heads in total and my favorite one is the big ball one, which is extremely relaxing, especially after a whole-day work. There are 20 different gear levels and switching the gear is very simple. The touchable screen is another feature which makes this product smart and cool.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn't last!
customer_reviews.text: Will work fine but battery is not working more then 5 minutes after a 4 weeks use... Just missed my return widow for return. Quite disappointed. It worked wonderful in the beginning then it suddenly stared to turn of at a battery life of 75% after 10 minutes now it only last about 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Crawford Craige

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: More affordable than similar models, does the trick for muscle pain relief and sore spots. Pretty powerful too! Ok battery life. Instructions aren't very clear, but I figured it out.
customer_reviews.author: 3D

customer_reviews.title: Gave my knee some much needed relief.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. Received it and plugged it in, the charge has lasted long. I have had chronic knee pain for a little over 2 years and after 1 day of using this product my knee feels great. Not all the pain is gone but definitely better than before. If you're looking for relief and don't wanna spend money at a chiro or a physician then maybe try this out, it's relatively cheap and it provides relief.
customer_reviews.author: carlos lago

customer_reviews.title: Best massage gun ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great personal massager gun! Everything comes perfect. It has a brunch of massage head attachments. But I mostly use the round ball. I really enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Yongyi Mai

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for at home pain relief and muscle relaxation!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!!! Different attachments to target different muscle groups. Have used it every day in my daughters back, and it has been a tremendous help with muscular pain relief. Have also used it as a foot and palm massager! Long battery life. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Candy J.

customer_reviews.title: Feels great, not bulky. No more muscle pain since I have been using it.
customer_reviews.text: Light, quiet, powefull. Has lots of attachments and variable speed. Great for deep tissue vibration. I use it after jogging on my legs and on my arms to reduce sourness.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Ulan

customer_reviews.title: Very value and very good product, I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I got it yesterday and gave to my parents, it’s very simple to use, my parents like it a lot! Easy and light to carry and us! Has several different choice of message model, same as image!
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: A MUST FOR ANYONE WHO HURTS!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these for myself and then purchased several more for friends as gifts. I introduced it to two others and that bought it for themselves. I should have bought stock in the company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Massage Gun
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful and affordable massage gun, really love this product. The massage gun has 20 different speed settings, and comes with different heads to fit your own personal taste. It definitely comes very handy for a quick massage after a hard day of work/gym workout. If you are looking for a great value massage gun, look no further, this is definitely a great product and would recommend to my friends/ family.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Peng

customer_reviews.title: Wireless
customer_reviews.text: It’s a really cool thing and comes in a pretty box. I like it that it is wireless when you trying to massage yourself. I’m thinking i might get my monther in law one of these as a birthday present.
customer_reviews.author: Jess M

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth Buying
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. The gun randomly shuts down and then you have to turn it off and then back on.
customer_reviews.author: M Lugge

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know massage guns existed until my friend told me about them. I LOVE this thing! It feels so good.I’m giving everything five stars,because so far so good. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: TMI

customer_reviews.title: Overall good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Pain relief for tight muscles is great. Battery life is short less than an hour. Easy to use but not everyone can apply enough pressure for someone needing deep tissue penetration.
customer_reviews.author: D Marschke

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful enough
customer_reviews.text: Not powerful enough- head stops vibrating when too much pressure is applied.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F

customer_reviews.title: long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: This was a great choice due to the pandemic, I usually get a massage once a month since the lock down my muscles are very tense. I love that its cordless I can do my neck and not worry about the cord. Very heavy duty, much quieter then I thought
customer_reviews.author: rrakim

customer_reviews.title: Nice little massage gun
customer_reviews.text: So glad I made the purchase! Definitely helped with sore muscles and I love the different types of attachments to help target different places on your body.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. Very heavy to hold for a period of time. Not really what I was expected but it some what helps a little but a bit pricy for a fancy looking massager.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Flo

customer_reviews.title: That was an amazing feeling.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on my girlfriend’s neck. She is very tight there but after just one use all tension was relieved. We have continued to use it once a day and it helps after a workout.
customer_reviews.author: Abdurrahman

customer_reviews.title: Great pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased because my girlfriend was experiencing sciatica pain in her thighs. This machine helped tremendously massaging deep tissue muscle on her thighs and relieving her from pain.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great deep tissue massage
customer_reviews.text: After Some very tough workouts, I used this and it could made the muscles feel better. Love the variety speed and different attachments. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this product great father's day gift
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family loves to use this. My little one loves for her back to be massaged which the different levels makes it safe for her because you control the speed and it slows down when you intensive it for too long kind of a safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Barge

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this massage gun
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It works just as described. I’ve used it every night since I bought it because I work long hours, and this actually helps me relax and relieves my sore muscles. It looks pretty too, there’s these little blue lights that light up when turned on which I think it’s pretty cool. Battery lasts pretty long. The only flaw I’d say is the level 1 and level 20 doesn’t have a big difference like level 1 is also pretty fast vibrations but other than that this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: xinyidon

customer_reviews.title: Works with ease and effective
customer_reviews.text: I have lower back pain and this product just works wonders on easing the pain. It is very straightforward and easy to use, which is a plus, especially when I am often lazy to move or go through the hassle of setting up a tool.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Ho

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have gotten this sooner. Holy cow, I instantly feel so much better after a long day of physical labor. If you're on the fence, BUY IT!
customer_reviews.author: LAL2019

customer_reviews.title: Get the job done
customer_reviews.text: This item is easy to use. It hits the spots just right. I have to share it with my wife because she loves the way it works on those deep tissue issues.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth brown

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty good deal and it does work
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my husband. He works at an Amazon fulfilment center. Says he's gotta be on his feet quite a bit. This helps.
customer_reviews.author: Ridley-Alysanne

customer_reviews.title: very relaxing and easy use.
customer_reviews.text: Glad to have it. Clear instructions and easy to use. It has six different heads and you can choose the strength you like. Very comfortable and relaxed after massaging especially for shoulder and legs. The best way is to ask someone to help you but not massage for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Works well and not expensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought this massage gun for my father-in-law. He have nothing but good things to say about it. It relaxes his whole body. It have different gears to choose from. You can choose the one that works well for you. It is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Chow

customer_reviews.title: Nice massage gun
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for similar massages, but most of them are very expensive. The product is reasonably priced and can meet my needs. I like this massage gun. It relieves muscle soreness. It comes with a very nice suitcase that can organize different massage heads. It is rechargeable and can be used without a rope. It has different speeds and has battery life indicators, so you know when to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Gary White

customer_reviews.title: Great massage gun for gifts
customer_reviews.text: The massage gun is a very good gift for other people especially for parents and grandparents. I have brought this for my grandma birthday a few day ago and she loved it so much. It helps her release all her muscle tension after workout during the quarantine. It’s easy to use and understand even she who doesn’t understand technology got a easy grip of how to use the item
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Massage gun
customer_reviews.text: Quiet and powerful machine highly recommended it my parents like it too
customer_reviews.author: Miu Miu Lai

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful massage gun
customer_reviews.text: My shoulder is very painful because I have time to play with the computer. Using this massage gun, I feel very effective. Generally, after ten minutes of use, I can feel the muscles relieve pain, and the effect is very obvious.
customer_reviews.author: mimiko

customer_reviews.title: Display is too sensitive.  Machine helps with pain.
customer_reviews.text: When i try to get your own back or neck by leaning into a pillow or chair, the buttons are so sensitive that it shuts itself off often. The machine does get pretty warm by 8 minutes of use. Chemical smell the first few uses.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: It's so convenient
customer_reviews.text: The first time I saw this product, I ordered it back. I was disappointed that I didn't get the product. Recently, my leg is very sore. I used this massage gun for several days continuously. The effect is very good. The calf doesn't hurt any more. Moreover, the operation of the product is very convenient, the accessories attached are very comprehensive, and the workmanship is exquisite. It's worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy T. Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Intensity/Battery % Keeps Varying
customer_reviews.text: I like this massager when it is working. However, that is only a fraction of the time - after a full charge, it starts off strong, and quickly (within seconds) degrades to lower intensity (showing a lower battery %), making it much less useful. I will probably have to return it, unfortunately. When it is at full speed, it is great, though.
customer_reviews.author: mondo_mike

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Total game changer for aches and pains. I wish I would have bought this yers ago.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunky

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great great product worth your money, good quality. I dont have lowe back pain anymore, even my son loves it
customer_reviews.author: zasm17

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this massage gun!! It feels high quality and is definitely worth the price! Because it has different modes and different heads, the user can customize how they use it to cater to what they need or like. Plus, it has really helped with my back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing massage gun!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this massage gun so far. I've been using it for two weeks and it does the job quite well. It comes with various massage heads and it has different functions. I personally like the small round massage head the most. Lastly, the price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Powerful massage gun
customer_reviews.text: This massage gun comes in 20 different strength levels, and I personally set it to a maximum of 10. I like the fact that it has a different replaceable head, so I can switch it accordingly. It's the best massage gun I've ever used. It's not too heavy. It's easy to change the frequency. I especially enjoy having my head massaged for different muscle groups.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I’m looking for
customer_reviews.text: I recently hiking a lot and really need to relax my leg. This massage gun is exactly what I am looking for. It has 6 different heads that you can switch, I personally love the screw shape.
customer_reviews.author: AllanC

customer_reviews.title: powerful
customer_reviews.text: this gun is really powerful...its heavy duty.....a bit bulky n heavy but gets the job done
customer_reviews.author: shanice

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied shopping
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied. The operation experience is very good, the frequency and strength are very good, both relaxed and comfortable, all parts of the body can be used, there are different gears and hammers to choose, the usual massage head has. The sound is not very loud. The power is very high. The muscles are very thorough and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Filiberto Alamilla

customer_reviews.title: Great for some people whom are working long hours
customer_reviews.text: After 10 hours working shift, I always looking for something that would helps me to release some muscles pain, and I found this massage gun, and I love it so much, easy to function! And the price is very reasonable! The quality of the product is great! And I also recommend it to my friends and families!
customer_reviews.author: Karen YJ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It don’t make my pain go away when I use it and it’s easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Yvonna playa-casiano

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable massage gun
customer_reviews.text: At present, I feel very comfortable when I use it. I usually put it in the first gear. After strength training, I relax my muscles and shake them. I recover a lot faster. The handle is wrapped with soft material. It is very comfortable to hold. When using it, you can operate two places: switch and up / down gear, which is easy to operate
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Connolly

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! It is easy to use and really helps with the muscle pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lille

customer_reviews.title: Love it but already can tell it’s starting to power down
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. Have been using it everyday since I got it. After few days of use however, I can already hear a different in it. As if it’s less powerful.
customer_reviews.author: rojina

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: I sit in front of the computer all the time, this massage gun is super useful for back and neck pain! There are 6 different massage heads with a variety of intensity vibrations! Very useful for pain relief!!
customer_reviews.author: MM. Wu

customer_reviews.title: Very good feeling in massage
customer_reviews.text: The product is excellent so far and came as described. Will continue to use it a few more times and see how long it lasts. The massager works very quietly, the battery charge is enough for a full body massage. Vibration creates very good. I'm very glad that I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Liza Kamps

customer_reviews.title: Comfort after use
customer_reviews.text: The effect is really good. It takes a week to evaluate. I walk a lot every day. I feel uncomfortable at night. I press the massage gun for 20 minutes. I feel great. The next day I got up early and walked briskly. Massage head is very complete, there are special massage feet, that is convenient and practical, charging is very fast
customer_reviews.author: Chris Duncan

product_meta.title: Hethtec Massage Gun, Handheld Muscle Massager for Pain Relief, 20 Speed, Includes 6 Massage Heads and Carrying Case
product_meta.description:
Noise: 48 db
Battery: 3*2000 mAh
Charging time: 2-3 Hours
20 Speeds: 1200-3200 BPM
Working Time: 3-6 Hours(Depends on Speed)

NOTICE:
1.In order to protect the battery, the massager will automatically stop after 10 minutes of continuously use and jump to 0 gear, you need to re-select the gear.
2.When the massage gun is not in use, please charge it once every 1 month to protect the battery.

Package Included:
1*Massage Gun
1*Power Charger
1*Carrying Case
6*Massage Heads
1*User Manual
feature_bullets: Hethtec professional massage gun helps restore the body faster
Rechargeable battery offers long operation time ( up to 3-6 hours ), so you don't need to charge it a lot
20 speeds, easy to change the speed that you want. the working noise is only 34dB- 54dB
Comes with 6 different heads for different muscle groups
Lightweight body and ergonomic design, anti-drop shell will keep the massage gun in good condition when dropping
